name: Rollercoaster Tycoon Joyride
summary: Soar through the sky with RollerCoaster Tycoon Joyride, a fully immersive coaster builder, and rider exclusively for PlayStation 4 and enhanced for PlayStation VR.
storyline: In the first virtual reality game in the RollerCoaster Tycoon series, players can build and ride breathtaking roller coasters in thrilling environments with an easy-to-use coaster builder. In a twist on the coaster experience, riders can shoot, blast, and explode moving targets to reach the top of the leaderboards. Compete against friends and challenge them in multiplayer mode and share your incredible coaster creations with other players on PSN.
